text: Gary A. Trousdale (born June 8, 1960) is an American animator, movie director, storyboard artist and screenwriter. He is best known for directing the movies such as Beauty and the Beast (1991), The Hunchback of Notre Dame (1996) and Atlantis: The Lost Empire (2001). == Other websites == * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American animators Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles County, California Category:Screenwriters from California
title: Gary Trousdale
